title: Google Cloud Pub/Sub
name: Google Cloud Pub/Sub
description:
Google Cloud Pub/Sub

You can do tons of cool stuff with Google Cloud Pub\Sub. For instance, you can publish. But you can also subscribe! It's not just about publishing, it's also for subscribing. I know we've been talking a lot about all the subscribing you can do, but it's very important to remember that you also have the option of Publishing with Google Cloud Pub/Sub.
